GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Face the traitors by the teleport
<color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Face the traitors by the teleport - Finished</color>
Contact the Children of the Source
<color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Contact the Children of The Source - Finished</color>
Prevent the Children of the Source ship from escaping - remaining turn(s):
Gain access to the teleport to the east
Captain Rao! My name is Burke. I'm the governor of this region. It has been brought to my attention that your UNSS network profile status recently changed to FUGITIVE. Explain yourself!
I was forced to act without orders! I am in pursuit of a dangerous traitor, my former commander, John Smith 7A!
He is already here, and I assure you his profile is clear. In fact, he expected your arrival.
Of course! He must have changed my status! Listen, my friends are interrogating a key witness as we speak. Smith's status will change as soon as they get a full confession.
Nice story. But you won't fool me. SERGEANT ZAGLOBA! Come here at once and arrest this deserter!
My eyes must be glitching! Isn't it private Rao, my favorite cadet? Have you come to cheer up your old commander?\n\nWait! What exactly does that slimy git Burke want to arrest you for?
Sergeant! That was a direct order!
Shut your trap, you human filing cabinet. I am talking to my friend!

Hello, sarge. As I was explaining, I'm chasing the Hesperidian responsible for the attack on the Gate Station and UNSS Ranock. The station's core landed somewhere to the east. He wants to destroy it for good.
That explains why he and the other Hesperidian are trying to fix that old teleport down the road! Cursed aliens! I will help you chase that bastard!
You two are out of your minds!
Shut up, you damn alien-loving bureaucrat.
You two will both face court-martials!
Thank you sarge. I ...
No need, my boy. From your first day at the academy, I saw something in you. Something the other colony-born strays lacked. You always served with honor, like a true soldier!
My former commander, John Smith 7A ...
Controls the southern base, and he is not alone. He brought two Hesperidian scumbags. And that rat Burke will do anything for his alien overlords.
It won't be easy to arrest him, but my friends will come with aid as soon as they finish the interrogation. Till then, we must improvise.
Nothing personal. Just following orders.
I will personally change your UNSS network profile status to deceased!
Do you know what happened with the other strays from the academy?
We ... lost touch. Peter became a salesman, and Anika escaped back to the Sovereigns. That's all I know.
And the rest just disappeared back into the gutter I scraped them from.
You should move on, Serge. It has been 12 years.
I cannot, boy. The whole project was my idea. They were my kids. I found them. I trained them ... all in vain, except you.
I cannot, boy. The whole project was my idea. They were my kids. I found them. I trained them ... all in vain, except you.
You are being too hard on yourself, Serge.
You are right, boy, as always! Let's kick some alien ass! That'll lift my spirits!
How has life treated you, Serge?
My knees squeak more, and the sun is shining less. I guess I turned into an old fart. But look at you, my boy. Already a captain!
I am afraid I went too far this time. If we don't catch Smith, I will surely lose my rank.
Don't worry, boy. I will live to see you wearing the general's stars.
First, the Children of the Source blocked the path to the east - and now you!
Stop wasting time with him, 2A. I need your help fixing the teleport down here.
Today is your lucky day, ape! Go home. If we meet again, I won't hesitate to end you.
That's him, the traitor! That's John Smith 7A!
Fool! This is bigger than you and me! I am protecting the whole UNSS.
Anything you wish to say to them, boy?
You are delusional, Smith! You cut us off from the Solar System, and without it, the UNSS is crumbling as we speak!
That's the point! It's crumbling here but not in the Solar System! This place! The Siren System must be contained no matter the cost!
There were two thousand men on Ranock! Nothing can justify mass murder!

He is human! You are wasting time 7A.\n\nThis teleport is beyond repair, and The Children of the Source will not let us use theirs. Use the orbital teleport near our base! It will be a difficult journey, but it will take you to the core eventually. I will ... join you later.
Thank you 2A. I will never forget this!
One step closer, human, and I will put you down like the animal you are!
Causing damage is the only thing ... you humans are ... good at.
They did not lie. It's broken.
Finally! My friends are here!
We bring a message from Admiral Nyota.
Maya set the comms to broadcast on all frequencies.

[RECORDED MESSAGE] I was presented with testimony that convicted Major John Smith 7A of treason. He is accused of plotting the attack that destroyed UNSS Ranock and damaged the Gate Station. He must be arrested and face justice. Furthermore ...
That's enough, Maya. Stop it.
So I fought for the bad guy? Luckily, I'm so flexible during such moments of moral ambiguity.
I've done nothing more than fulfill my contract.
New commanders have joined your forces.
New commanders have joined your forces.
This changes nothing!
Hurry up, John 7A!
Gergie-larh! After him!
Too late!
Damn it! The Hesperidian I defeated mentioned a teleport guarded by the Children of the Source to the east! It's the only way we can pursue Smith now.
It's worth a try. At least they won't attack us head-on. The UNSS has a peace treaty with their order.
Do I smell NAPHTHALENE?!
No, that would be pretty racist of me.
I literally see it in your hand!
Oh! These are just mothballs. I always keep some in case some "moths" try to "eat my coat."
Stop! Stop! STOP throwing them at me! Gergie-larh, I am leaving, stop ... unbelievable!
You are about to enter lands under the protection of the Children of the Source.
We pursue the fugitive responsible for the collapse of space travel. He is already in orbit, seeking a path east! Let us use the teleport on your territory.

So, the fugitive chose death. That path is darker than most. I already told him that some foolish Fossorians destroyed the whole area with an atomic reaction! That cursed thing you call "the core" is gone.
The core was made by the Primals. Some of their devices survived a lot more than atomic blasts.
I won't listen to you glorifying the skills of our ancient enemies! If you attack us, you will violate the peace treaty between UNSS and my order! Brother Rishard, go, wake the ship!
Yes, brother Artar, I will. But, she is in deep sleep. It will take some time to wake her fully.
Did you hear him? He spoke about a ship! A SHIP! Have they really brought one of their rare original ships here!?
Forgot the ship, doctor! Smith and the core are our priorities. We must force our way to the teleport. The fate of the UNSS is at stake!
I don't like it, captain. It's too risky. What if we don't make it in time? What if we start a war? Doctor, should I ... ?
Not yet.
Come on! One last push! With the power of the Solar System on our side, no one will dare to mess with the UNSS again. Not even the Children of the Source!
Do you understand that if we do this, we can't let any of the Children escape?
I am fully aware of that.
Stop this madness! This mindless destruction will only escalate into more tragedy!
Maybe we should ...
Enough! We have wasted too much time on talk of peace. Time is running out! Attack!
That's ... a true Children of the Source ship!
What a beauty! It's a miracle to find one in such good condition! Imagine the possibilities if we capture her. All that technology the Children of the Source do not want to share with us!
It's just a ship! Focus, doctor! We came for Smith!
You will not defile her! I have sworn to protect her with my life! Step back!
I warned you!
The order can no longer contain the truth! But there is still a chance for redemption!
What is he talking about?!
I must warn them. We must strike immediately! It is our last hope.
No! We must stop him from escaping! The UNSS would not survive a conflict with the Children of the Source!
All ranged units, fire at that ship!
NO! THE SHIP MUST NOT BE HARMED!
It will save countless lives! FIRE!
WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?!
He did what needed to be done.
Finally, you understand what it means to serve an ideal - To serve without compromise. But all your efforts are in vain. Computer, give them full access to my Drone dogs.
Behold, the core is destroyed. The path to the Solar System is closed forever. Finally, I can rest.
Be quiet. Sure, I will tell him!

Come, Smith. Once, you helped us with our rebellion, and I always repay my debts. You and your friends are under the protection of the Fossorian people now. And I have a gift for you. Do you remember our first meeting? Do you remember that old Relic?
You can hide amongst Fossorians for a time, but sooner or later, I will hunt you down!

But without my help. You killed that ship because it stood in your way. Gergie-larh! Like it was a piece of brainless metal. You are just like Smith 7A ... Maya, play him the rest. I don't care anymore.
Don't you dare to lecture me about morality! I bet there are a dozen failed experiments begging for death in your lab as we speak! Did you want him to warn his order? God Dammit!
I am sorry, captain. There is more in the message from Admiral Nyota. We agreed not to play it earlier in case we would catch Smith and had something to bargain with ... but now ...
[RECORDED MESSAGE] ... Furthermore, for the act of defection, I revoke Captain Rao's contract. There is no place in the UNSS for such a display of disobedience and ...
We spoke in your favor, Rao. But your Sovereign Fleet history ... They just wouldn't listen. We lost, it's over.
Not for me. Not yet.
Time's up! The ship carrying a message to the Children of the Source has taken off! War is inevitable, and without the Solar System, there is no hope for the UNSS.
